Control Name: Integrates With Risk Assessment—Control activities help ensure that risk responses that address and mitigate risks are carried out.

control_attributes.Control: Integrates With Risk Assessment—Control activities help ensure that risk responses that address and mitigate risks are carried out.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC5.1 COSO Principle 10: The entity selects and develops control activities that contribute to the mitigation of risks to the achievement of objectives to acceptable levels
